description.romanian: Serviți prima masă.
Faceți primul dvs. Combo.
Un combo de șapte.
Serviți 13 mese la rând.
Faceți 500 într-un singur nivel.
Faceți 1000 într-un singur nivel.
Faceți 2500 într-un singur nivel.
Mergeți 2000 de metri.
Mergeți la o distanță de 5 kilometri.
Mergeți la o distanță de 10 kilometri.
Mergeți la o distanță de 25 kilometri.
Beți această băutură energizantă.
S-a găsit robotul.

description.english: A true fan and a great artist.
description.german: Ein echter Fan und ein wahrer Künstler.
description.romanian: Un fan adevărat și un mare artist.
description.brazilian: Um fã verdadeiro e um grande artista.

description.english: Drink another energy drink while the first one is still active.
description.german: Trinke einen weiteren Energy-Drink, während der erste noch aktiv ist.
description.romanian: Beți o băutură de energie diferită în timp ce prima este încă activă.
description.brazilian: Beba outra bebida energética enquanto ainda estiver sob efeito de uma primeira.
description.koreana: 에너지 드링크 효과가 적용된 상태에서, 다른 에너지 드링크를 마셨습니다.

description.english: Crash into all drunks at the beer hall.
description.german: Laufe alle Betrunkenen in der Bierhalle über den Haufen.
description.romanian: Loveșitete de toți beții la sala de bere.
description.brazilian: Esbarre em todos os bêbados na cervejaria.

description.german: 250 verärgerte Gäste haben das Restaurant verlassen.
description.romanian: 250 de clienți nebuni au părăsit restaurantul.

description.english: Open and close the kitchen doors 450 times.
description.german: Öffne und schließe die Küchentüre 450 mal.
description.romanian: Deschideți și închideți ușa bucătăriei de 450 de ori.
description.brazilian: Abre e feche as portas da cozinha 450 vezes.

description.english: Complete all levels on normal mode.
description.german: Meistere alle Levels im normalen Modus.
description.romanian: Finalizați toate nivelurile în modul normal.
description.brazilian: Complete todos os níveis no modo normal.

description.english: Complete all levels on hell mode.
description.romanian: Finalizați toate nivelurile în modul iad.
description.brazilian: Complete todos os níveis no modo inferno.

description.english: Complete the first level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den ersten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the second level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den zweiten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the third level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den dritten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the fourth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den vierten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the fifth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den fünften Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the sixth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den sechsten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the seventh level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den siebsten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the eighth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den achten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the ninth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den neunten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the tenth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den zehnten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the eleventh level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den elften Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the twelfth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den zwölften Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the thirteenth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den dreizahnten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Complete the fourteenth level in hell mode.
description.german: Schließe den vierzehnten Level im Höllenmodus ab.

description.english: Over 250 happy customers left the restaurant.
description.german: Mehr als 250 zufriedene Gäste haben das Restaurant verlassen.

description.english: Over 1000 happy customers left the restaurant.
description.german: Mehr als 1000 zufriedene Gäste haben das Restaurant verlassen.

description.english: You distracted the person with the suitcase.
description.german: Du hast die Person mit dem Koffer abgelenkt.

description.english: Complete the first level on normal difficulty and make $500.
description.german: Schließe den ersten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene $500.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 500$ 이상을 벌면서 첫번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the second level on normal difficulty and make $600.
description.german: Schließe den zweiten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene $600.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 600$ 이상을 벌면서 두번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the third level on normal difficulty and make $1100.
description.german: Schließe den dritten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene $1100.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 1100$ 이상을 벌면서 세번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the fourth level on normal difficulty and make $1200.
description.german: Schließe den virten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene $1200.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 1200$ 이상을 벌면서 네번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the fifth level on normal difficulty and make $1300.
description.german: Schließe den fünften Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene $1300.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 1300$ 이상을 벌면서 다섯번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the sixth level on normal difficulty and make $1400.
description.german: Schließe den sechsten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene $1400.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 1400$ 이상을 벌면서 여섯번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the seventh level on normal difficulty and make $3000.
description.german: Schließe den siebten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene $3000.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 3000$ 이상을 벌면서 일곱번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the eight level on normal difficulty with some extra cash.
description.german: Schließe den achten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene zusätzliches Geld.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 추가 수익을 벌면서 여덟번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the ninth level on normal difficulty with some extra cash.
description.german: Schließe den neunten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene zusätzliches Geld.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 추가 수익을 벌면서 아홉번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the tenth level on normal difficulty with some extra cash.
description.german: Schließe den zehnten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene zusätzliches Geld.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 추가 수익을 벌면서 열번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the eleventh level on normal difficulty with some extra cash.
description.german: Schließe den elften Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene zusätzliches Geld.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 추가 수익을 벌면서 열한번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the twelfth level on normal difficulty with some extra cash.
description.german: Schließe den zwölften Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene zusätzliches Geld.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 추가 수익을 벌면서 열두번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the thirteenth level on normal difficulty with some extra cash.
description.german: Schließe den dreizehnten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene zusätzliches Geld.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 추가 수익을 벌면서 열세번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Complete the fourteenth level on normal difficulty with some extra cash.
description.german: Schließe den vierzehnten Level im Normalmodus ab und verdiene zusätzliches Geld.
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 추가 수익을 벌면서 열네번째 스테이지를 완료했습니다.

description.english: Serve all VIP orders at once.
description.german: Erfülle alle Bestellungen eines VIP-Gastes an einem Stück.
description.koreana: 한 번에 모든 VIP 고객의 주문을 처리했습니다.

description.english: Acquire and use up all perks in one level.
description.german: Verwende alle Fertigkeiten in einem Level.
description.koreana: 모든 특성을 습득한 후 한 스테이지에서 모두 활성화시켰습니다.

description.english: Achieve an overall cash amount of 35.000.
Consume seven energy drinks in just one level.
description.german: Konsumiere sieben Energy-Drinks in einem Level.

description.english: Don't let the restaurant rating drop.
